name: bolt-admin-tools
title: Bolt Admin Tools
description: Internal utilities for StackBlitz/Bolt support flows such as user lookups and token management.
author: jorrit_harmamny

commands.name: bolt-admin-search
commands.title: Open Bolt Admin User
commands.description: Jump to StackBlitz admin filtered by user ID or e-mail.
commands.subtitle: Support Tools

commands.name: bolt-user-id-capture
commands.title: Capture User ID from Browser
commands.description: Extract the numeric StackBlitz User ID from the active Chromium tab and copy it to the clipboard.
commands.subtitle: Support Tools

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
